doc:
Sig Ruman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sig_Ruman 0 Siegfried Carl Alban Rumann (October 11, 1884 – February 14, 1967) billed as Sig Ruman, was a German-American actor known for his portrayals of pompous and often stereotypically Teutonic officials or villains in more than 100 films. Siegfried_Carl_Alban_Rumann ( October_11_,_1884 – February_14_,_1967 ) billed as Sig_Ruman , was a_German-American_actor known for his_portrayals of pompous_and_often_stereotypically_Teutonic_officials or villains in more_than_100_films .
